word_mean: 苯胺，阿尼林：无色油状液体，C6H5NH2。商业上从煤焦油和靛蓝中将硝基苯还原而制成。稍溶于水，易溶于醚及酒精。与其他物质，尤其与氯及氯酸盐结合，可获得阿尼林色素或染料。它是引起严重工业中毒(主要是急性正铁血红蛋白血症)的重要原因。另见anilinism

sentence.Network_en: It is insoluble in carbon disulphide, soluble in hot aniline and phenol.
sentence.Network_cn: 它不溶于二硫化碳, 溶于热苯胺和苯酚.

sentence.Network_en: Callose stains are aniline blue, resorcin blue and rosolic acid.
sentence.Network_cn: 胼胝质的染剂是苯胺蓝, 间苯二酚蓝和玫红酸.

sentence.Network_en: N - phenyl maleimide was synthesized from maleic anhydride and aniline.
sentence.Network_cn: 以顺酐和苯胺为原料,合成N - 苯基马来酰亚胺.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from anil 'indigo' (from which it was originally obtained), via French and Portuguese from Arabic an-nīl (from Sanskrit nīlī, from nīla 'dark blue')

means.word_mean: 1. oily poisonous liquid amine obtained from nitrobenzene and used to make dyes and plastics and medicines
